item.title: Five charged in connection with Liam Payne's death, reports say
item.description: The One Direction star died in October after falling from a third-floor hotel balcony in Buenos Aires.

item.title: Dozens die in Ethiopia after lorry with wedding guests falls into river
item.description: It is thought the truck, which was reportedly carrying several wedding guests, was overloaded.

item.title: Jimmy Carter's challenges mirror those faced by Biden
item.description: From Afghanistan to climate change, Carter's presidency charted the course for future US presidents.

item.title: At the scene of the South Korea plane crash investigation
item.description: The BBC's Asia correspondent visited the scene, where investigators are sifting through the fuselage.

item.title: Carlsen to rejoin chess championship after jeans dispute resolved
item.description: The world champion quit the tournament on Friday after being told he had breached the dress code.
